name: Clin N Appendix
title: Clinical N
notes:
**Note 1:** Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in M (distant metastasis).

**Note 2:**  Assign N1 if regional lymph nodes are involved but there is no indication of the number of nodes involved.

**Regional lymph nodes for appendix:**

    Celiac
        Anterior (prececal)
        Ileocolic
        Posterior (retrocecal)
        Right colic
    Colic, NOS
    Epicolic (adjacent to bowel wall)
    Mesenteric, NOS
    Mesocolic, NOS
    Paracolic/pericolic

    Regional lymph nodes, NOS
    Lymph nodes, NOS
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Clinical evaluation but unknown results or regional lymph node involvement not stated
Clinical evaluation done but results not documented in patient record
Metastasis in 4 or more regional lymph nodes
Clinical N is not defined for the specific site/histology

No clinical evaluation of regional lymph nodes
Cancer first detected on surgical resection
Unknown if any clinical assessment performed
